  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerId) throws InvalidPlayerIdException
      Creates a player with given id to game unless he already exists
      Parameters:
      playerId - playerID to initialize new player with
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerIdException - thrown when player of given ID already exists

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer(String playerId)
      Removes a player from players list
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of a player which should be removed
      Returns:
      true if player of given ID have existed in the list, otherwise false

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame(int startingMoney, int ante)
      Initializes game data
      Parameters:
      startingMoney - money every player starts with
      ante - amount of money players are obligated to spend
